attributes.action: Leave the EU on 12th April with no deal.
attributes.additional_details: 108 times the Prime Minister told us we leave on 29th March - deal or not. It is written in law. Now they want to change the law until it suits them. If they continue this nonsense then the Queen should dissolve parliament and let the law run for 29th March exit.
attributes.background: We voted leave so now get us out. Don't bother with a deal. We will survive even if some of our MPs lose their jobs. We elected you to represent us - we voted to leave the EU. Your manifestos promised we would leave. Keep your promises if you want to keep your jobs.
